title.rendered: “Unmasking Hamas: IDF Reveals Interactive Website Showcasing Terror Activities in Gaza Strip Hospitals”

content.rendered:
The IDF uncovers an interactive website that displays the operation method of the Hamas terror organization in the hospitals of the Gaza Strip in both English and Arabic.

As part of the effort to expand legitimacy and expose Hamas’ activities in the hospitals of the Strip, the IDF spokesperson reveals a unique website that centralizes a variety of materials that have been exposed about the hospitals. The site centralizes preliminary information that has been published and up-to-date information that has been exposed. The site will be updated as needed with various findings to be discovered during the ongoing war.

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where the action of the Hamas terror organization in the hospitals on the strip is detailed:https://www.idf.il/minisites/hamas-operation-in-hospitals-hebrew-article/
